Desc.eng: Sir! We have secured the Launch Tower. We are awaiting your commands.
Good work! Move against the field artillery , occupy the position, then return here to defend the tower.
Great job! There is a railway gun not far from here. Destroy the weapon, then return here to defend the tower.
Stay here and defend the Launch Tower! We can't let the enemy occupy this place!
Three Resistance soldiers are coming with me! The others stay here and defend the Launch Tower!
